item.description:
The Brettl-Hupfers will be up at our lodge in Bartlett NH for the weekend. There are two opportunities for discounted or free lift tickets this weekend.

The EICSL ski club league is having a race at Cranmore on Saturday. The Brettl-Hupfers race team will be racing there and discount tickets are available for any members and guests of the club. You don’t need to race to get the discount ticket.

We’ll also have a group of people headed over to Cannon, which is about 45 minutes away. The FNX snowriders will be there on Saturday and we’re going out to their warmup party on Thursday night where they will be giving out lift tickets for the weekend. So come out Thursday and you might ski Cannon for free.

Guests are welcome at the club for $20 per night guest fees. Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be at the club, come on in and say hello
item.name: FNX Weekend at Cannon & Race weekend and Cranmore
